page.title: 16Smaller Villages
page.content:
{Kinsham}is a small hamlet, with a population of about 250 people. A dairy delivers milk to the district. There are two or three farms.
{Aston on Carrant,}a small hamlet so named because the Carrant Brook flows near it, has a population of less than 100 people. .There is a transport depot and an old manor house{. { {Lower Kemerton}has a few scattered houses , a former school closed in 1950 and two large houses - Lower and Upper Court .There are two beautiful man-made lakes which support much wildlife.
